<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Onidoshi](/Monsters.aspx?ID=746)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Onidoshi, or ogre mages, are oni with the material form of an [ogre](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=78). Onidoshi's supernatural prowess and overwhelming intellect are enough to awe and cow entire families of rank-and-file ogres. Because of this, onidoshi are often found at the head of ogre war parties or orchestrating these violent campaigns from behind the scenes. It's rare for onidoshi to lead solitary existences, but those who do prefer to maraud the countryside or exploit villages and hoard the spoils for themselves.
